base_description: Gray, rectangular, angular structure with two panels.
part_description: Consists of two rectangular panels positioned at right angles, each panel equal in size and shape, forming a corner structure.
internal_interaction_description: The two panels are connected along one edge, forming a stable right-angle configuration. This design allows the panels to support each other structurally, maintaining the shape and providing stability to the object as a whole.
external_interaction_description: This structure can serve as a partition or corner in architectural designs, interacting with floors and ceilings for support. It may also interact with other panels to form walls or enclosures, providing spatial separation or privacy in various environments.
